#configureassignmentarea.text: Configure your assignments by editing your info and clicking in 'Apply'button

#configureassignmentsearch.text: Type to search for assignment to configure

#massoperation.text: Handout, collect, correct or reassignt assignment for all students of the course

#searchbystudent.text: Search either student name or username to handle/grade/feedback on assignment

#individualoperation.text: Area to handle/grade/feedback on assignment by student
